name: Dolly (John_Chef)
description:
The small lovely sheep known as Dolly must enter the underworld and defeat it's fiercest guardians in order to save her flock. As dolly, your quest is to defeat all four bosses with only your knives and wool. The journey will be difficult, a combination of both skill and trial & error will be needed.

This game was made in 2 months for a school project.
